Name: Hope For Village
About the game: Hope For Village is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, enemies of kingdom... Who do you think will win? Features Mini RPG Survival game! You can loot items! Craft new weapons! Manage the basic farm system! Buy new weapons and armors! Fight with enemies and monsters! You can fish! You can cook! You can be a miner! Turn Based Combat System! Sail your own boat! Day & Night System! Explore the forest, discover secret places...
